description: Expansion of square of continued fraction 1/ ( 1+q/ ( 1+q^2/ ( 1+q^3/ ( 1+q^4/... )))).
references: For the third power see G. E. Andrews, Simplicity and surprise in Ramanujan's "Lost" Notebook, Amer. Math. Monthly, 104 (No. 10, Dec. 1997), 918-925.
crossrefs: See A007325 for first power (which has an alternative g.f.), A055102 for cube, A055103 for 4th power.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jun 14 2000
extensions: More terms from Kok Seng Chua (chuaks(AT)ihpc.nus.edu.sg), Jun 20 2000
